00020 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_AND_H
00021 #define CONSTRAINT_AND_H
00022 
00024 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename VarRef3>
00025 struct AndConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00026 {
00027   virtual string constraint_name()
00028   { return "And"; }
00029   
00030   VarRef1 var1;
00031   VarRef2 var2;
00032   VarRef3 var3;
00033   AndConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, VarRef1 _var1, VarRef2 _var2, VarRef3 _var3) : AbstractConstraint(_stateObj),
00034     var1(_var1), var2(_var2), var3(_var3)
00035   {
00036     CHECK(var1.getInitialMin() == 0, "The 'and' constraint works only Booleans");
00037     CHECK(var1.getInitialMax() == 1, "The 'and' constraint works only Booleans");
00038     CHECK(var2.getInitialMin() == 0, "The 'and' constraint works only Booleans");
00039     CHECK(var2.getInitialMax() == 1, "The 'and' constraint works only Booleans");
00040     CHECK(var3.getInitialMin() == 0, "The 'and' constraint works only Booleans");
00041     CHECK(var3.getInitialMax() == 1, "The 'and' constraint works only Booleans");
00042   }
00043   
00044   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00045   {
00046     triggerCollection t;
00047     t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, 1), LowerBound));
00048     t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, 2), LowerBound));
00049     t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, 3), LowerBound));
00050     t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, -1), UpperBound));
00051     t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, -2), UpperBound));
00052     t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, -3), UpperBound));
00053     return t;
00054   }
00055   
00056   virtual void propagate(int i, DomainDelta)
00057   {
00058     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(And);
00059     switch(i)
00060     {
00061       case 1:
00062         if(var2.isAssignedValue(true))
00063           var3.propagateAssign(true);
00064         else
00065         {
00066           if(var3.isAssignedValue(false))
00067             var2.propagateAssign(false);
00068         }
00069           break;
00070         
00071       case 2:
00072         if(var1.isAssignedValue(true))
00073           var3.propagateAssign(true);
00074         else
00075         {
00076           if(var3.isAssignedValue(false))
00077             var1.propagateAssign(false);
00078         }
00079           break;
00080         
00081       case 3:
00082         var1.propagateAssign(true);
00083         var2.propagateAssign(true);
00084         break;
00085         
00086         
00087       case -1:
00088       case -2:
00089         var3.propagateAssign(false);
00090         break;
00091         
00092       case -3:
00093         if(var1.isAssignedValue(true))
00094           var2.propagateAssign(false);
00095         else
00096         {
00097           if(var2.isAssignedValue(true))
00098             var1.propagateAssign(false);
00099         }
00100           break;
00101     }
00102     
00103   }
00104   
00105   virtual void full_propagate()
00106   {
00107     if(var1.isAssignedValue(false) || var2.isAssignedValue(false))
00108       var3.propagateAssign(false);
00109     
00110     if(var1.isAssignedValue(true) && var2.isAssignedValue(true))
00111       var3.propagateAssign(true);
00112     
00113     if(var3.isAssignedValue(false))
00114     {
00115       if(var1.isAssignedValue(true))
00116         var2.propagateAssign(false);
00117       if(var2.isAssignedValue(true))
00118         var1.propagateAssign(false);
00119     }
00120     
00121     if(var3.isAssignedValue(true))
00122     {
00123       var1.propagateAssign(true);
00124       var2.propagateAssign(true);
00125     }
00126     
00127   }
00128   
00129   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00130   {
00131     D_ASSERT(v_size == 3);
00132     return ((v[0] != 0) && (v[1] != 0)) == (v[2] != 0);
00133   }
00134   
00135   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00136   {
00137     if(var3.getMax() == 1)
00138     {
00139       if(var1.getMax() == 1 && var2.getMax() == 1)
00140       {
00141         assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, 1));
00142         assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, 1));
00143         assignment.push_back(make_pair(2, 1));
00144         return true;
00145       }      
00146     }
00147     
00148     if(var3.getMin() == 0)
00149     {
00150       if(var2.getMin() == 0)
00151       {
00152         assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, 0));
00153         assignment.push_back(make_pair(2, 0));
00154         return true;
00155       }
00156       
00157       if(var1.getMin() == 0)
00158       {
00159         assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, 0));
00160         assignment.push_back(make_pair(2, 0));
00161         return true;
00162       }
00163     }
00164     return false;
00165   }
00166   
00167   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00168   { 
00169     vector<AnyVarRef> v;
00170     v.push_back(var1);
00171     v.push_back(var2);
00172     v.push_back(var3);
00173     return v;
00174   }
00175   
00176   // Function to make it reifiable in the lousiest way.
00177   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00178   {
00179       vector<AnyVarRef> t;
00180       t.push_back(var1);
00181       t.push_back(var2);
00182       t.push_back(var3);
00183       return new CheckAssignConstraint<vector<AnyVarRef>, AndConstraint>(stateObj, t, *this);
00184   }
00185      
00186 };
00187 
00188 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename VarRef3>
00189 AbstractConstraint*
00190 AndCon(StateObj* stateObj, VarRef1 var1, VarRef2 var2, VarRef3 var3)
00191 { return (new AndConstraint<VarRef1,VarRef2,VarRef3>(stateObj, var1,var2,var3)); }
00192 
00193 #endif
